Reviews.Title: “A great hotel in a good location!”

Reviews.Content: initially unsure booming caledonian hotel tend 4 star hotels looking reviews decided actually 4 stars looking disappointed hotel location 10 minute brisk walk plaza catalunya top rambla size huge bed clean pay safety deposit box 4 euros day didnt charge final day left 11 am tv english channels apart music channel internet free intermittent useful phones ipad able balcony nice watch goings outside breakfast hotel package badly priced 8 euros day overall staying hotel return barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Great stay in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: MacPow
Reviews.Content: husband spent 3 days touring barcelona wonderful time hotel situated perfect spot grand via minutes ramblas corner placa de catalunya streets fantastic shops hotel staff pleasant found met restaurants bars attentive helpful clean comfortable lovely view gran via tiny balcony stand watch world lovely little restaurant beside hotel purchase breakfast reasonably spanish bar corner opposite serves till late hotel

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights caledonian city break barcelona excellent location 10mins walk placa de catalunya friendly helpful staff english speaking clean liked kettle hotel quiet didnt breakfast plenty cafes near coffee pastry days sightseeing close metro universitat easy station airport stay recommend doing similar trip
